properties.shortDescription: Attractive three bedroom semi-detached family home situated within 0.5 miles of Petts Wood station.
properties.description: Attractive three bedroom semi-detached family home situated within 0.5 miles of Petts Wood station with fast trains to London and within easy walking distance of local shops, schools, bus routes and National Trust woodland. The property comprises; two receptions, fitted 18'9 x 10'1 kitchen/breakfast room and conservatory. The property also benefits from having a utility room and cloakroom. To the first floor there are three bedrooms and a family bathroom with separate WC. Additional features include double glazing, gas central heating and a well presented interior...
properties.location: Petts Wood Road, Petts Wood, Orpington BR5

properties.shortDescription: Presented in excellent decorative order throughout is this two double bedroom, two bathroom, garden flat.
properties.description:
Presented in excellent decorative order throughout is this two double bedroom, two bathroom, garden flat.
The modern fitted kitchen is open plan to the living room which boasts solid wooden floors and includes integrated appliances including a dishwasher & a washing machine. This large open plan benefits from bi folding doors onto a secluded private courtyard garden. Both bedrooms are double sized, and the family bathroom boasts a matching three piece suite a shower attachment over the bath. There is also a separate wet room. There are walnut doors throughout and wiring for Sky TV/aerial points in the living room/kitchen and both bedrooms.
This apartment being only five years old, is still under a 10 year building guarantee...

properties.shortDescription: Spacious four bedroom detached house located in a quiet residential cul-de-sac.
properties.description: Spacious four bedroom detached house located in a quiet residential cul-de-sac. The property offers a large open-plan living and dining area, modern fitted kitchen, study, and downstairs WC. Upstairs features four generous bedrooms including a master with en-suite, and a family bathroom. Benefits include a private garden, garage, and off-street parking.

properties.shortDescription: Well-maintained three bedroom bungalow offering single-level living.
properties.description: Well-maintained three bedroom bungalow offering single-level living. Features include a bright lounge, modern kitchen, conservatory, and a family bathroom. Externally the property benefits from a landscaped rear garden, driveway parking, and a detached garage. Ideal for families or downsizers.

properties.shortDescription: Modern one bedroom apartment situated close to transport links and local amenities.
properties.description: Modern one bedroom apartment situated close to transport links and local amenities. The property includes an open-plan kitchen and living area, a double bedroom with built-in storage, and a contemporary shower room. Additional features include secure entry system and allocated parking.

properties.shortDescription: Impressive five bedroom executive home offering luxury living throughout.
properties.description: Impressive five bedroom executive home offering luxury living throughout. The ground floor comprises multiple reception rooms, high-spec kitchen with island, utility room, and cloakroom. The first floor features five bedrooms, two with en-suites, and a family bathroom. The property also benefits from a large garden and double garage.

properties.shortDescription: Two bedroom first-floor maisonette presented in good condition throughout.
properties.description: Two bedroom first-floor maisonette presented in good condition throughout. The property offers a spacious lounge, fitted kitchen, two bedrooms, and a family bathroom. Additional benefits include a private rear garden and close proximity to schools and public transport.
